answers.answer: Hi,How are you? What other symptoms are present? The peeling white skin may be attributed to candida infection. If there is no recent history of sexual contact, intake of antibiotics as well as underlying medical conditions like diabetes may be responsible. If it persists, further evaluation by a gynecologist  is recommended. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: Hey, i had protected sex over a year ago havent since but recently my vagina has little cuts around the clit and lining, also little balls(mushy) of white like peeling skin everywyhere. I checked through sexually transmitted disease's and there doesn't seem to be anything there, it hasnt healed in weeks and is sometimes painful. Please help.
title: Vagina Help Please!
